name: The Nun
desc: Avoid her and escape through doors.She always stands next to the door.

name: Horrible Man
desc: Reveal all enemy cards to catch him, need to catch him three times

name: Snowman
desc: Summons enemies to adjacent tiles. Dazzle him three times to stop it

name: Nutcracker
desc: Revealing it costs 1 HP and all Gifts

name: Bell
desc: Ring it to go to the next level

name: Light
desc: Use it to reveal an enemy to dazzle him

name: Church
desc: Revealed at the start of the level

name: Ice Ground
desc: Reveals a random adjacent safe tile

name: Sign
desc: Points toward the Bell or other exit

name: Alarm
desc: If any enemy adjcent, alert, otherwise keep quite.
